actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the exclusion from gross income of a certain portion of amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits by individuals who have attained age 65.
short_title: Tax Relief for Elderly Pensioners Act

summary.text: Tax Relief for Elderly Pensioners Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of individuals age 65 or over amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits. Limits the exclusion to $7,500 for single individuals and $10,000 for joint returns.

titles.title: Tax Relief for Elderly Pensioners Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the exclusion from gross income of a certain portion of amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits by individuals who have attained age 65.
